subject: OutOfMemoryError
msgSnippet: Hi all. I m wondering if anyone might have a strong opinion about the likely cause of a java.lang.OutOfMemoryError in the awt version of the UI. It s happened
messageBody:
Hi all.

I'm wondering if anyone might have a strong opinion about the likely cause
of a java.lang.OutOfMemoryError in the awt version of the UI.

It's happened a few times after I've had JUnit up and running for hours at
a time.

I'm wondering if anyone's experience might point toward memory leaks in the
code being tested, (I know, "this is Java...") leaks in the tests,
over-taxed JUnit (not that many tests, though, about 50), or something else.

Thanks,
Frank

Frank Enos
Merkley Newman Harty
AdArts
